timeline.author: dain
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,47 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Oct 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add {func}`concat_ws` function. ({issue}`4680`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `time with time zone` values with precision other than 3. ({issue}`5539`)
+* Add dynamic filtering support for right joins. ({issue}`5555`) 
+* Add support for catalog session property to file based session property manager. ({issue}`5330`)
+* Add support for catalog session property to database based session property manager. ({issue}`5330`)
+* Improve query scalability by increasing broadcast join buffer size to 200MB.
+  Broadcast join buffer size can be set using `sink.max-broadcast-buffer-size` feature config. ({issue}`5551`)
+* Improve query performance by allowing larger dynamic filters. ({issue}`5529`)
+* Improve dynamic filtering across connectors by adding implicit cast support for dynamic filters. ({issue}`5461`)
+* Improve performance when encrypted spilling is enabled. ({issue}`5557`)
+ 
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add support for JSON Web Key (JWK) to the existing JSON Web Token (JWT) authenticator.  This is enabled by 
+  setting the `jwt.key-file` configuration property to a `http` or `https` url. ({issue}`5419`)
+* Add column security, column mask and row filter to file-based access controls. ({issue}`5460`)
+* Enforce access control for column references in `USING` clause. ({issue}`5620`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Use `hive.domain-compaction-threshold` threshold for compacting dynamic filters. ({issue}`5365`)
+* Support reading Parquet timestamp encoded as microseconds. ({issue}`5483`)

replies.bodyText: i am fine with that. should i start/prefix every new feature with "Add support for .." then? @dain ?
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: Add/Fix/Improve. I think we should keep each point a sentence in present simple tense.

@@ -0,0 +1,47 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Oct 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add {func}`concat_ws` function. ({issue}`4680`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `time with time zone` values with precision other than 3. ({issue}`5539`)
+* Add dynamic filtering support for right joins. ({issue}`5555`) 
+* Add support for catalog session property to file based session property manager. ({issue}`5330`)
+* Add support for catalog session property to database based session property manager. ({issue}`5330`)
+* Improve query scalability by increasing broadcast join buffer size to 200MB.
+  Broadcast join buffer size can be set using `sink.max-broadcast-buffer-size` feature config. ({issue}`5551`)
+* Improve query performance by allowing larger dynamic filters. ({issue}`5529`)
+* Improve dynamic filtering across connectors by adding implicit cast support for dynamic filters. ({issue}`5461`)
+* Improve performance when encrypted spilling is enabled. ({issue}`5557`)
+ 
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add support for JSON Web Key (JWK) to the existing JSON Web Token (JWT) authenticator.  This is enabled by 
+  setting the `jwt.key-file` configuration property to a `http` or `https` url. ({issue}`5419`)
+* Add column security, column mask and row filter to file-based access controls. ({issue}`5460`)
+* Enforce access control for column references in `USING` clause. ({issue}`5620`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Use `hive.domain-compaction-threshold` threshold for compacting dynamic filters. ({issue}`5365`)
+* Support reading Parquet timestamp encoded as microseconds. ({issue}`5483`)
+* Fix failure when reading Parquet `timestamp` columns encoded as `int64`. ({issue}`5443`)
+
+## MongoDB Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for adding a column. ({issue}`5512`)
+
+## MySQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries with aggregations and `LIMIT` clause (but without `ORDER BY`). ({issue}`5261`)
+
+## PostgreSQL Connector Changes
+
+* Improve performance of queries with aggregations and `LIMIT` clause (but without `ORDER BY`). ({issue}`5261`)
+
+## Redshift Connector Changes
+
+* Add support for setting a column comment. ({issue}`5397`)

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe merge those (as file and database are only session property managers we support right now).
Add support for catalog session properties to session property manager. Both file and database backed property managers are supported.

+## General Changes

+* Add {func}`concat_ws` function. ({issue}`4680`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `time with time zone` values with precision other than 3. ({issue}`5539`)
+* Add dynamic filtering support for right joins. ({issue}`5555`)

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,57 @@
+# Release 345 (XX Oct 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add {func}`concat_ws` function. ({issue}`4680`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `time with time zone` values with precision other than 3. ({issue}`5539`)
+* Add dynamic filtering support for right joins. ({issue}`5555`) 
+* Add support for catalog session properties to session property manager. Both file and database backed property 
+  managers are supported. ({issue}`5330`)
+* Improve query scalability by increasing the default broadcast join buffer size to 200MB.
+  Broadcast join buffer size can be set using `sink.max-broadcast-buffer-size` feature config. ({issue}`5551`)
+* Improve query performance by allowing larger dynamic filters. ({issue}`5529`)
+* Improve dynamic filtering across connectors by adding implicit cast support for dynamic filters. ({issue}`5461`)
+* Improve performance when encrypted spilling is enabled. ({issue}`5557`)
+* Improve performance of queries that use decimal type. ({issue}`5181`)
+ 
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add support for JSON Web Key (JWK) to the existing JSON Web Token (JWT) authenticator.  This is enabled by 
+  setting the `jwt.key-file` configuration property to a `http` or `https` url. ({issue}`5419`)
+* Add column security, column mask and row filter to file-based access controls. ({issue}`5460`)
+* Enforce access control for column references in `USING` clause. ({issue}`5620`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Use `hive.domain-compaction-threshold` threshold for compacting dynamic filters. ({issue}`5365`)
+* Support reading Parquet timestamp encoded as microseconds. ({issue}`5483`)
+* Fix failure when reading Parquet `timestamp` columns encoded as `int64`. ({issue}`5443`)
+* Fixes disk space accounting when cachin is enabled. ({issue}`5621`)
+* Improve cached files distribution. ({issue}`5621`)

timeline.bodyText: Fix disk space accounting for storage caching.
timeline.author: electrum

+# Release 345 (XX Oct 2020)
+
+## General Changes
+
+* Add {func}`concat_ws` function. ({issue}`4680`)
+* Add support for {func}`extract` for `time with time zone` values with precision other than 3. ({issue}`5539`)
+* Add dynamic filtering support for right joins. ({issue}`5555`) 
+* Add support for catalog session properties to session property manager. Both file and database backed property 
+  managers are supported. ({issue}`5330`)
+* Improve query scalability by increasing the default broadcast join buffer size to 200MB.
+  Broadcast join buffer size can be set using `sink.max-broadcast-buffer-size` feature config. ({issue}`5551`)
+* Improve query performance by allowing larger dynamic filters. ({issue}`5529`)
+* Improve dynamic filtering across connectors by adding implicit cast support for dynamic filters. ({issue}`5461`)
+* Improve performance when encrypted spilling is enabled. ({issue}`5557`)
+* Improve performance of queries that use decimal type. ({issue}`5181`)
+ 
+## Security Changes
+
+* Add support for JSON Web Key (JWK) to the existing JSON Web Token (JWT) authenticator.  This is enabled by 
+  setting the `jwt.key-file` configuration property to a `http` or `https` url. ({issue}`5419`)
+* Add column security, column mask and row filter to file-based access controls. ({issue}`5460`)
+* Enforce access control for column references in `USING` clause. ({issue}`5620`)
+
+## Hive Connector Changes
+
+* Use `hive.domain-compaction-threshold` threshold for compacting dynamic filters. ({issue}`5365`)
+* Support reading Parquet timestamp encoded as microseconds. ({issue}`5483`)
+* Fix failure when reading Parquet `timestamp` columns encoded as `int64`. ({issue}`5443`)
+* Fixes disk space accounting when cachin is enabled. ({issue}`5621`)
